name: Ritual of Retribution
description: Exalt in the sacred light of the Aedra, cleansing up to 2 harmful effects from yourself immediately.  While in the area, enemies take 898 Magic Damage every 2 seconds for 12 seconds which increases by 5% per tick.    Allies in the area can activate the Purify synergy, cleansing all harmful effects from themselves and healing for 1886 Health.
effectLines: The area now harms enemies who enter it, rather than healing allies.  Damage increases over duration.
coefDescription: Exalt in the sacred light of the Aedra, cleansing up to 2 harmful effects from yourself immediately.  While in the area, enemies take $1 Magic Damage every 2 seconds for 12 seconds which increases by 5% per tick.    Allies in the area can activate the Purify synergy, cleansing all harmful effects from themselves and healing for $2 Health.
